thread.title: Notava launches Voyager WiFi service for travelers
thread.title_full: Notava launches Voyager WiFi service for travelers

author: Kari Kailamaki
title: Notava launches Voyager WiFi service for travelers
text:
Voyager WiFi service is designed to address common and profound yet still under-served need of International traveler – effortless, secure and affordable carrier-grade Internet connectivity.
Service will be providing travelers convenient and affordable alternative to cost-prohibitive cellular data roaming during their stay in metropolitan areas in selected countries. While free WiFi hotspots may be available at some scattered locations those are typically unsecure, cumbersome to access and provide only poor connection quality.
In contrast to other global WiFi service offerings - which are targeted mainly to large corporate customers and require commitments to recurring monthly payments - Voyager WiFi provides individual travelers full flexibility to purchase service coverage ad-hoc as prepaid consumable packages exactly for when and where connectivity is actually needed.
Uniquely smooth customer experience in purchasing and consuming the service packages has been made possible leveraging Notava’s patented uAxes technology. Having fully automated seamless connectivity to Voyager WiFi hotspots customers are no longer required to type in cryptic access codes or expose their identity.
Voyager WiFi service packages will be made globally available through partnering Airlines and Online Travel Agencies and online from voyagerwifi.com
Kari Kailamaki, CEO of Notava states “We are excited to introduce this new service concept to market addressing underserved needs of travelers. Strategically speaking what we are building here is a flywheel effect connecting the interests of multiple parties into a virtuous cycle. Travelers will have flexible access to high-quality Internet connectivity at affordable terms, owners of carrier-grade WiFi assets can turn available network capacity into wholesale revenues, airlines and online travel agencies will have attractive retail opportunity to bundle and upsell their customers complementary service packages and Notava obviously benefits by taking its fair share of every transaction for facilitating and operating this ecosystem. Our unique approach has been very well received and validated by all the companies we have approached so far offering business partnership”
Voyager WiFi is now available for Android and iOS devices offering coverage of 200,000+ carrier-grade hotspots across all the major cities in Japan, expansion to other major markets soon to follow.
Takaharu Fujii, President of Notava K.K in Japan adds “Japan was perfect choice for Notava as one of the first markets to launch this new service concept since it is highly advanced in terms of wireless infrastructure and indeed is several years ahead of most markets in evolution of mobile Internet services”
About Notava
Notava is leading innovator of cutting-edge business solutions powering next generation WiFi services for wireless network operators and major brands.
WiFi Service Factory™, based on Notava’s patented uAxes technology is a purpose-built solution turning available carrier-grade WiFi capacity into fully dynamic asset fit for wholesale and distribution.
Notava operates globally with offices in Finland, Japan and USA.
For more information about the Notava story please visit http://www.notava.com
